name: Tamagotchi Versus
description:
Version 1.00 is ON!!! Enjoy our two days of work ! :))

Please leave some feedback, we will really appreciate :)

GL HF from devs

Team:

  • Tomasz Marcinkiewicz - GFX
  • Piotr Stoch - CODE
  • Grzegorz Kiernozek - CODE
  • Artur Szczęch - Music & SFX
  • Małgorzata Sinius - GFX
  • Maciej Walaszczyk - CODE

*IMPORTANT*

you can see the game and experience visuals and music

BUT

you need 1 xbox one controller connected and a friend to play

Steering:

player 1: arrows for selection and movement, ctrl for shoot and space for jump

player 2: left analog for selection and movement, A for shoot, B for jump

Sorry for inconvinience, we will fix that up when we will have a sec :)
